WaveSoundBuffer.PhaseVocoder.overlap

機能/意味
Overlap count
タイプ
WaveSoundBuffer.PhaseVocoderクラスのプロパティ (読み書き可能)
説明
　Represents the overlap count (oversampling factor).
　Specify 0 or a power of 2 number between 2 and 32. Default is 0.
　If 0 is specified, an appropriate value will be set according to the current value of the time property.
　Increasing this value will increase the resolution in the time axis direction. Especially if you want to slow down the playback speed, it is better to set a higher value.
　Higher values use more CPU.
　Changes to this property take effect in real time, but due to buffering, it may take up to two seconds for it to actually play. Also, noise may occur when switching.
